title: Bookjacket Design, "Original Collage Design for "Artists & Enemies, 3 Novellas" by Arthur A. Cohen", 1986
medium: Red, blue, grey and black paper with black letterpress on white wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted at top center in black ink: ARTISTS & ENEMIES
At lower center: 3 NOVELLAS/ ARTHUR A. COHEN
Signed on back in pencil: Elaine Lustig Cohen 1986
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Collage design for the book "Artists & Enemies, 3 Novellas." The cover has a collage design consisting of a red half circle and black square on the left. Black, blue, red and grey partial squares on the right and small black, grey and blue lines in the center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bookjacket Design, "Original Collage Design for "Artists & Enemies, 3 Novellas" by Arthur A. Cohen", 1986.
1986. Red, blue, grey and black paper with black letterpress on white wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-60.
